body: I don't know when to use the gamma keys, Can anyone help me?
body_tagged: I don't know when to use the gamma keys, Can anyone help me?
title: where do i use the keys i bought?

replies.body: Use the gold nugget thing in the hub once you earn crates in games.
replies.body_tagged: Use the gold nugget thing in the hub once you earn crates in games.

replies.body: Use them in game to open Gamma crates.
replies.body_tagged: Use them in game to open Gamma crates.

replies.body: You must have a Gamma crate to open it, if you have, click the key, its in the backpack-.
replies.body_tagged: You must have a Gamma crate to open it, if you have, click the key, its in the backpack-.

replies.body: After each match, two people are awarded with crates. You must wait until you are awarded the crate matching your key, in this case being a gamma crate. Check your backpack (enderchest) every once in a while. This can be found in your hotbar when in the hub.
replies.body_tagged: After each match, two people are awarded with crates. You must wait until you are awarded the crate matching your key, in this case being a gamma crate. Check your backpack (enderchest) every once in a while. This can be found in your hotbar when in the hub.
